item.title: whoami?
item.description: â“ IntroductionI am a former cyberdefense student at ENSIBS and currently working as Threat Researcher for Sekoia.io. I previously worked as a Threat Hunter for WithSecure, as part of WithSecure Countercept team. I am also part of the x33fcon #crew, helping the team organizing and running the event. My favorite infosec fields are OSINT, forensics and malware analysis. ðŸ’» Infosec, or about 80% of my lifeBeing passionate about computer security, I practice during my free time various activities in the field.
